The goal of rivRmon is to provide tools to aid in data munging and visualisation of monitoring data from the Swan and Canning Rivers.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/dbca-wa) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("dbca-wa/rivRmon")
library(rivRmon)
```
## Help Files

All functions within rivRmon have the usual R help files, however the best place to see these and some vignettes is the [rivRmon website](https://dbca-wa.github.io/rivRmon/index.html)
